h2. JumpScale Docs For Developers

Please help us to contribute to this documentation

* the documentation is on [https://bitbucket.org/jumpscale/doc_jumpscale]
* send an email to info@incubaid.com to ask for a login to this repo.

* bibucket repos: [https://bitbucket.org/jumpscale/]

* additional libraries: [https://bitbucket.org/jumpscale/jumpscale_lib]
* example code: [https://bitbucket.org/jumpscale/jumpscale_examples]
* jumpscale portal code: [https://bitbucket.org/jumpscale/jumpscale_portal]
